title: Event Hub Update Iconography
custom_preconds:
[BPA-7974](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7974)

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed Android 14.6.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to a home team venue that is supported for Event Hub [BPA-7996](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7996)




To configure venue_links (iconography) the following can be used to help with understanding
*mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e
**venue_links_v1_beta is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1_beta ) controlling BP-Client Staging
**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client QA

*mlb-ballpark-app-831
**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-ballpark-app-831](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client Prod
BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER



we map the section types to symbols/icons
    extension VenueLink {
      public enum Category: String, CaseIterable {
        case parking = "PARKING"
        case guide = "AZ_GUIDE"
        case gates = "GATE_INFO"
        case bagPolicy = "BAG_POLICY"
        case safety = "HEALTH_AND_SAFETY"
        case upgrade = "SEAT_UPGRADE"

        var iconName: String? {
          switch self {
          case .parking:
            "info.parking"
          case .guide:
            "info.guide"
          case .gates:
            "info.gate"
          case .bagPolicy:
            "info.bagpolicy"
          case .safety:
            "info.health"
          case .upgrade:
            "info.misc"
          }
        }
      }
    }
custom_steps: GIVEN User display with Next Ticketed Event Card (V2) on Home Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User is on the Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed a Home NextTicketed Event card (V2)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Home NextTicketed Event card (CTA above 'Open Tickets')
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to the EventHub page for that specific venue
AND user the venue image is directly above My Tickets and Stadium Info sections

AND each entry within Stadium Info section shows the desired icon prior to the the text
[figma](https://www.figma.com/file/0oNryxBGauTBWja78zdQkX/Ballpark-Redesign-(DS)?type=design&node-id=7-28680&mode=design&t=z6nD2Q9sank2l3Pf-0 )

To configure venue_links (iconography) the following can be used to help with understanding
*mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e

**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client QA

custom_steps:

GIVEN the remote config values of venue_links_v1_beta(mlb-mobile-npd) is set up to show links with Id, opensInBallpark, Title, url (example [CLE](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1_beta~2F5 )

**Gate Times
**Bag Policy
**Parking & Transportation

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is directed to the page (configured in URL key) with the page opened within an internal webview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps a Stadium Info link that is configured as *opensInBallpark* set to false
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is directed to the page (configured in URL key) with the page opened within an external browser

title: Directions to Venue from Event Hub (End to End)
custom_preconds:
[BPA-7978](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7978)

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed android 14.6.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to a home team venue that is supported for Event [Hub BPA-7996](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7996)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Direction Component in Event Hub
Scenario: Display venue address with map

GIVEN the user is on the Event Hub screen
WEHN the screen loads
AND user display with Directions Content card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Directions component should be visible
And it should display the address link of the  MLB Ballpark (i.e 501 Marlins Way, Miami, FL 33125)
AND it should include a Google Maps embedded map centered on LoanDepot Park (this may vary based on venue) 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14877422)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Scenario: Launch Google Maps with correct directions
GIVEN the user is on the Event Hub screen
AND Google Maps is installed on the device
WHEN the user clicks on the Directions component or address link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Google Maps should open
AND it should show directions from the user’s current location to respective Ballpark (i.e. "501 Marlins Way, Miami, FL 33125")

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14877423)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Scenario: Fallback behavior when Google Maps is not installed
GIVEN the user is on the Event Hub screen
AND Google Maps is not installed on the device
WHEN the user clicks on the Directions component or address link

Note: Most of the Android devices now a days has in built Google Maps and it won't allow for delete so user have to disable the app to test this functionality
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Google Maps should open in Webview
AND it should show directions from the user’s current location to respective Ballpark 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14877424)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Scenario: Handle tap on the embedded map
GIVEN the user is on the Event Hub screen
AND Google Maps is installed on the device
WHEN the user clicks anywhere on the Directions component content card or address link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Google Maps should open
AND it should show directions from the user’s current location to respective Ballpark (i.e. "501 Marlins Way, Miami, FL 33125")

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14877423)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Scenario: Prevent app crash if Google Maps is not available or address link is invalid 
GIVEN the user is on the Event Hub screen
AND Google Maps is installed on the device
WHEN the user clicks anywhere on the Directions component content card or address link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app should not crash or freeze
AND the user should remain on the Event Hub screen

title: Weather Kit Feature Flag / Attribution (THIS IS NOT FINAL)
custom_preconds:
[BPA-7977](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7977)


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed Android 14.6.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to a home team venue that is supported for Event Hub [BPA-7996](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7996)

NOTE: WEATHER SECTION REQUIRES TO BE WITHIN 10 DAYS OF EVENT 



--------
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup: weather_data_provider
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "isActive" within desired "providers" as needed to force display. 
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config/env/firebase?query=weather_data_provider)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config/env/firebase?query=weather_data_provider)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform)

CONFIGURATION TROUBLESHOOTING NOTES:
*Section will ONLY show for event that is within 10-day range from TODAY
*Verify condition is what is expected (if using condition) - ex: verify 'iOS QA' isn't tied to a specific version of the app that may not apply to version being tested

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN weather_data_provider has 'isActive' set to true
AND User has ticketed event that is within 7 day range from TODAY
WHEN User is on the Home Tab with NTE Home Card (v2) shown
AND User taps on Home NextTicketed Event card (CTA above 'Open Tickets')
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to the EventHub page for that specific venue
AND user is shown a header info* particular to the event
AND user is shown a venue image directly below the event header info
AND user the venue image is directly above My Tickets and Stadium Info sections

*example of Header info:
**Tigers at Guardians  (team logos on the right)
**Tue, May 7 * 610 PM EDT 
**Progressive Field

AND user is shown 'Weather' section below 'Stadium Info' section and above 'Directions' section
AND the weather section contains a weather icon (ex:sun image)
AND the weather section contains a weather temperatures (ex:83/72) and other weather details (ex: Mostly Clear, Precipitation: 0%, Wind: 11 mph)

NOTE: Weather section is informative (does NOT have a CTA)

AND user is shown 'Forecast powered by Apple(logo) Weather Legal' at the bottom of the page
AND 'Legal' is a link with a CTA to Apple Weather doc (https://developer.apple.com/documentation/weatherkit/weatherattribution )

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN weather_data_provider has 'isActive' set to true
AND User has ticketed event that is NOT within 10-day range from TODAY* 
WHEN User is on the Home Tab with NTE Home Card (v2) shown
AND User taps on Home NextTicketed Event card (CTA above 'Open Tickets')

*(event is for more than 10 days in future)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to the EventHub page for that specific venue
AND user is shown a header info* particular to the event
AND user is shown a venue image directly below the event header info
AND user the venue image is directly above My Tickets and Stadium Info sections

*example of Header info:
**Tigers at Guardians  (team logos on the right)
**Tue, May 7 * 610 PM EDT 
**Progressive Field

AND user is NOT shown Weather section
AND user is NOT shown 'Forecast powered by Apple(logo) Weather Legal' at the bottom of the page

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN weather_data_provider has 'isActive' set to false
AND User has ticketed event that is within 10-day range from TODAY
WHEN User is on the Home Tab with NTE Home Card (v2) shown
AND User taps on Home NextTicketed Event card (CTA above 'Open Tickets')
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to the EventHub page for that specific venue
AND user is shown a header info* particular to the event
AND user is shown a venue image directly below the event header info
AND user the venue image is directly above My Tickets and Stadium Info sections

*example of Header info:
**Tigers at Guardians  (team logos on the right)
**Tue, May 7 * 610 PM EDT 
**Progressive Field

AND user is NOT shown Weather section
AND user is NOT shown 'Forecast powered by Apple(logo) Weather Legal' at the bottom of the page

title: MLB Wallet - Add Data Tier Implementation to Event Hub

[BPA-7974](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7974)


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed Android  14.7.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to a home team venue that is supported for Event Hub
AND the EventHub has configured Wallet for the ticketed event




To configure venue_links (iconography) the following can be used to help with understanding
*mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e
**venue_links_v1_beta is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1_beta ) controlling BP-Client Staging
**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client QA

*mlb-ballpark-app-831
**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-ballpark-app-831](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client Prod
BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN EventHub for the venue has configured Wallet for the ticketed event
WHEN User is on the Home Tab
AND User taps on Home NextTicketed Event card (CTA above 'Open Tickets')
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to the EventHub page for that specific venue
AND user the venue image is directly above My Tickets and Stadium Info sections
AND there is an entry within Stadium Info section shows the desired icon (wallet) prior to the the text (Go Ahead Pay)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Go Ahead Pay entry within Stadium info
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is directed to the new 3rd party web view, passing over relevant data (dataTier=3)

title: My Tickets TDC/TM
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed iOS 14.7.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to a home team venue that is supported for Event Hub [BPA-7996](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7996)
custom_steps:
Background: 
User is on a screen displaying the My Tickets component on Event Hub
GIVEN the user is logged into the Ballpark application
And the user has navigated to a view that contains the "My Tickets" component on Event Hub

custom_steps_separated.content: **Scenario: My Tickets - View TDC Tickets event**

Given the user has an upcoming event with TDC tickets
When the "MyTickets" component for the TDC event is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User display with UI
And the "My Tickets" should be visible
And the "Barcode icon" should be visible
And the text "Access via Ticketmaster" should NOT be visible for TDC event 
And the "Chevron right icon" should be visible

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the "MyTickets" component for the TDC event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the application should navigate the user to the Ticket list screen in the Tickets tab for that TDC event

custom_steps_separated.content: **Scenario: My Tickets - View TM Tickets event**

GIVEN the user has an upcoming event with TDC tickets
WHEN the "MyTickets" component for the TDC event is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User display with UI
And the "My Tickets" should be visible
And the "Barcode icon" should be visible
And the text "Access via Ticketmaster" should be visible
And the "Chevron right icon" should be visible

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the "MyTickets" component for the TM event
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the application should open the TM ticket view for that event (TMSDK)

Note: 
IF user not logged in then TM SDK Log In page display
